• Yono Lite SBI available in Tamil, Gujarati and Panjabi.
Use 'Change Language' option available in login page (top right corner).
• UI-UX enhancements

• SBI Anywhere Personal is now re-branded as 'Yono Lite SBI'
• UI enhancements

• Yono Lite SBI is now available in Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam and Marathi. Use 'Change Language' option available in login page.
• Temporary discontinuation of Wearable support on Apple Watch. It will be available soon after upgradation.
• mPassbo

• Raise Complaints through Pre-Login Menu ->Complaints
• Security enhancements & improvements
• Support for Alphanumeric Beneficiary Account Numbers during Fund transfer (Other Bank) & Quick Transfer
• Enhancements in UPI functionalit

• Manage & Load Money in NCMC (National Common Mobility Card) card through Topup & Recharge Menu
• Enhancements in UPI transaction & daily limit
• Option to Explore Yono - Our NextGen App
• Enhancements to 'View & Download Account
